snippet: The Supreme Court must hold the state accountable for failing to pay for defense lawyers.
abstract: Editorial calls on Supreme Court to hold state of Louisiana accountable for failing to pay for defense lawyers for Jonathan Boyer, who spent more than seven years in prison waiting to be tried on charges of armed robbery and murder; contends only possible remedy is for court to dismiss case against Boyer and set aside his conviction.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court must hold the state accountable for failing to pay for defense lawyers.
